description: The Food and Drug Administration approved and granted emergency-use authorization for updated Covid-19 vaccines for Moderna and Pfizer. NBC News’ medical fellow Dr. Akshay Syal reports on who should be getting this new shot.
title: FDA approves updated Covid-19 vaccines

description: President Joe Biden joined in February, then former President Donald Trump in June.
title: What ban? Big-name politicians flock to TikTok in search of young voters

description: Pop singer Pink and country trio The Chicks are expected to perform on the fourth and final night of the Democratic National Convention on Thursday, two sources familiar with the planning told NBC News.
title: Pink and The Chicks are expected to perform on the final night of the DNC

description: New data seems to show Texas Gov. Abbott did not send a single bus of migrants out of the state in July, despite vowing at the RNC to keep sending buses north.
title: Gov. Greg Abbott sent no migrant buses from Texas to blue cities in July

description: Former President Donald Trump appeared to promote an “official” cryptocurrency project using his name in a Truth Social post on Thursday.
title: Trump teases 'official' cryptocurrency project

description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., an anti-vaccine activist, appears to be angling for a role in Donald Trump's cabinet, potentially as secretary of health and human services.
title: RFK Jr. as Trump’s health secretary? Here’s what he wants to do

description: Gov. Tim Walz closed out the third night of the Democratic National Convention a day before Vice President Harris is set to take the stage. NBC News' Yamiche Alcindor breaks down what we should expect from the vice president on the final night of the DNC.
title: What to expect ahead of Harris' speech on the final night of the DNC

description: JD Vance responded to Gov. Walz’s DNC address, where he shut down Walz’s claim that Vance said childless people don’t have worth, but instead is trying to push the country to be more “pro-family.” He says he wants Walz to articulate how his vice presidency is going to “make the lives of the American people better.”
title: JD Vance says Walz's DNC comments were a 'nasty personal attack'

description: Watch highlights from the third night of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz officially accepted the party's nomination to be Vice President Harris' running mate as former President Clinton and Oprah Winfrey voiced their support.
title: Watch highlights from Night 3 of the Democratic National Convention in 3 minutes

description: Gov. Tim Walz accepted the Democratic nomination for vice president at the DNC, expressing gratitude to Vice President Harris for her trust. He highlighted his journey from teacher to congressman and his accomplishments as Minnesota’s governor, touching on issues like infertility, IVF, and responsible gun ownership. He concluded his speech with an inspiring "fourth quarter" pep talk, drawing on his experience as a coach.
title: Walz in acceptance speech: 'Never underestimate a public school teacher'
